content:
2 parts, the auther of the item answer, that should be in the SDC QR profile right?
The other, is there an extension to link the prepop selected obs to the answer?
So can know hasn't changed, and don't need to created another?
And should that even be a thing?
@Brian Postlethwaite - were you intending to respond to an existing item? I'm not following...

Sorry, late night post must have been half asleep.
Was asking if the item answer auther extension can be included in the SDC QR profile. (was looking for it and expected it there)
And also another question, if we use an observation to populate an item answer, is there an extension to reference that obs in the answer?

I haven't logged one yet, was just double checking something didn't exist already that I'd missed.
I was considering either supportingInfo (which didn't feel right) or event-basedOn extensions
I was actually asking about the author extension. I don't think we have one for Observation either - though my general notion is that's best handled through Provenance
Following the provenance track, if my form has 20 observations collated into it, then I'll have 20 provenance records?

Depends on the granularity of the assertions. If you want to say "This QR was populated by these 20 Observations", you need one. If you want to say "Question 1 came from Questionnaire A and Question 5 and 7 came from Questionnaire B, etc., then you'll need 20 Provenances
Ah, then I'll be doing a custom reference extension. The provenance gives me nothing else for my usage. It's all in the one server from the one Organization.
